    • rotateAround

      public Vector3 rotateAround(Vector3 axis, double angle)
      Rotates this vector around the given axis by the specified angle. Uses Rodrigues' rotation formula for efficient rotation.
      Parameters:
      axis - The axis to rotate around (will be normalized)
      angle - The rotation angle in radians
      Returns:
      New rotated vector

    • calculateFresnel

      public static double calculateFresnel(Vector3 viewDir, Vector3 normal, double ior1, double ior2)
      Calculates Fresnel reflection coefficient
      Parameters:
      viewDir - View direction
      normal - The surface normal (normalized)
      ior1 - Index of refraction of first medium
      ior2 - Index of refraction of second medium
      Returns:
      Fresnel reflection coefficient between 0 and 1

    • randomInUnitSphere

      public static Vector3 randomInUnitSphere(Random rand)

    • reflect

      public static Vector3 reflect(Vector3 incident, Vector3 normal)
      Verilen incident vektörünün, normal vektöre göre yansıma vektörünü hesaplar.
      Parameters:
      incident - Gelen vektör (ışın yönü).
      normal - Yansıma yüzeyinin normal vektörü.
      Returns:
      Yansıma vektörü olarak yeni bir Vector3 nesnesi döner.
